article.title: On a lower bound for the energy functional on a family of Hamiltonian minimal Lagrangian tori in $\mathbb CP^2$

choices: The definition of a Hamiltonian minimal Lagrangian torus.
The composition of mappings that define a Lagrangian torus.
The energy functional of a Lagrangian torus.
The Lagrangian angle of a Lagrangian torus.

multiple_choice_question.text: What do the functions F₁ and G₁ represent in Formula (2)?
choices: The components of the mean curvature vector field of a Lagrangian torus.
The real and imaginary parts of the coordinates of a Hamiltonian minimal Lagrangian immersion.
The parameters defining a homogeneous torus.
The solutions to the Tzizeica equation.
The energy functional of a Hamiltonian minimal Lagrangian torus.
The area functional of a Hamiltonian minimal Lagrangian torus.
The period of the function v(x) for a Hamiltonian minimal Lagrangian immersion.
The rationality constraint for a doubly periodic Hamiltonian minimal Lagrangian immersion.

multiple_choice_question.text: What does the inequality in Formula (9) represent?
choices: A lower bound for the area functional of a Hamiltonian minimal Lagrangian torus.
A lower bound for the Willmore functional of a Hamiltonian minimal Lagrangian torus.
A lower bound for the energy functional of a Hamiltonian minimal Lagrangian torus.
A lower bound for the integral of the squared mean curvature of a Hamiltonian minimal Lagrangian torus.
